title: AppendixBreak
description: A break in a document indicating the start of a new appendix.
$comment:
Similar to a LaTeX \appendix command, this node causes figure and table numbering to switch
to be prefixed by 'A' (for the first appendix), 'B', and so on.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.
